document.full_text: novak djokovic extended his perfect record this season to 17-0 with a thrilling 6-3 3-6 6-2 victory over three-times champion roger federer saturday to reach the indian wells final.
document.title: djokovic to face nadal in indian wells final
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic extended his perfect record this season to 17-0 with a thrilling 6-3 3-6 6-2 victory over three-times champion roger federer saturday to reach the indian wells final.
